p:
A GA was used to search for low energy structures by defining the fitness as a function of energy. All structure relaxations during the GA search were performed by LAMMPS code
23 with Embedded-Atom Method (EAM) potential in Finnis-Sinclair form
24 . As previously shown
4, 11 , this FS potential fitted to first principles calculation data, in general, gives a satisfactory estimation of the relative thermodynamic stability of the known stable and meta-stable phases.
